Working on adding a shoryuken button.

The user engaged with the AI assistant to implement various features in an app, specifically a 'hadoken' button. They were presented with choices regarding the button's location and functionality, such as placing it on the main navigation bar or embedding it within user profiles. The user requested to add a hadoken button multiple times, and the AI acknowledged each request affirmatively. Additionally, the user explored other features to implement, like customizable user profiles, real-time chat functionality, and an email form for contacting Santa. The AI noted these suggestions, confirming the addition of these features and asking clarifying questions, including the design and specific positioning of the button and email form. Ultimately, the user was asked about their project to better understand their needs as the implementation progressed.
